column2: Let us begin our magic training!
I will end my training for now
I have failed in my magic training
The masters of magic favors me this day! I have become a mage!
I'm off to train as a mage!
I am off to train as a mage! This will be hard work, and dangerous, but I know I can do it!
I must sadly end my training with failure. I'm sure I will try once more when the right time arises!
After days of learning how to control my magic, I will attempt a new spell!
I am now ready to put my knowledge of magic to the test. Lets hope this goes well!
It is time to put my magic training to the test!
Oh no! My magic training has failed!
What have I done?! I've completed failed in my training!
I may have failed in my magic training, however, I was able to increase my magic ability in the process!
I may have failed, but thank goodness I have not harmed myself in the process!
I was successful in magic training!
I have succeded in my magic training after weeks of hard work!
